name: Valentine Card
description:
Handmade Linocut printed Valentine's Day card.

The design for this card was carved into a piece of lino and printed onto watercolour paper using waterbased ink. Each card is unique; the hand printing process means that slightly different effects and colours will be created each time.

Each print is mounted on an A5 sized folded greetings card (220gsm), meaning that it slots easily into a standard sized frame, should you wish to keep the piece permanently. Each print has been signed and dated by the artist.

This is the first product in a range of greetings cards to be launched periodically throughout the year.

Items are shipped from Cyprus, so please allow up to a week for delivery. All items will be packed in cardboard for safe delivery.
